```{r}
library(scales)
library(fivethirtyeight)
library(maps)
library(zipcode)
library(tidyverse)
```


```{r}
states <- map_data("state")
ggplot(data = states) +
  geom_polygon(aes(x = long, y = lat, group = group), color = "white") +
  coord_fixed(1.3) +
  guides(fill = F)
```
